page.title: 0375 YEARS OF GUIDING
page.content: On Monday 24th June,{Princess {Margaret}lit a flame at{Buckingham {Palace}to represent 75 years of Guiding. Commissioners from all over the country went to receive the flame and brought it back to their own districts. Mrs. Snowdon, our Division Commissioner, and two rangers brought the flame back to Blyth from St. Oswald's Church, Heavenfield. On Wednesday 26th. June,1985 the Blyth Division Brownies and Guides met the flame which arrived by{Fire {Engine.}We formed a big circle and from the flame we lit our own personal candle which we keep as a momento of a special night.
